headline: REGN Loses 21.1% Year to Date: Buy, Sell or Hold the Sock?

headline: BMO Capital Maintains a Buy on Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN)
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) is one of the Best Low Cost Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 8, Evan Seigerman from BMO Capital maintained a Buy rating on Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) with a price target of $640. The analyst noted that his rating is based on the strong results from Phase 3 […]
